content.2: And Moses alone shall come near the
content.3: And Moses came and told the people all the words of the
content.4: And Moses wrote all the words of the
content.5: And he sent young men of the children of Israel, which offered burnt offerings, and sacrificed peace offerings of oxen unto the
content.6: And Moses took half of the blood, and put
content.7: And he took the book of the covenant, and read in the audience of the people: and they said, All that the
content.8: And Moses took the blood, and sprinkled
content.9: Then went up Moses, and Aaron, Nadab, and Abihu, and seventy of the elders of Israel:
content.10: And they saw the God of Israel: and
content.11: And upon the nobles of the children of Israel he laid not his hand: also they saw God, and did eat and drink.
content.13: And Moses rose up, and his minister Joshua: and Moses went up into the mount of God.
content.14: And he said unto the elders, Tarry ye here for us, until we come again unto you: and, behold, Aaron and Hur
content.15: And Moses went up into the mount, and a cloud covered the mount.
content.17: And the sight of the glory of the
content.18: And Moses went into the midst of the cloud, and gat him up into the mount: and Moses was in the mount forty days and forty nights.
